definition: "Immer" is an adverb that typically denotes a continuous or uninterrupted state or action. It is commonly used to express the idea of "always" or "constantly" in various contexts.

examples.german: Sie ist immer freundlich zu mir.
examples.english: She is always friendly to me.

examples.german: Wir gehen immer ins Kino am Wochenende.
examples.english: We always go to the cinema on weekends.

examples.german: Immer wenn es regnet, nehme ich meinen Regenschirm mit.
examples.english: Whenever it rains, I take my umbrella with me.
